title: Leaverbuster
body: I was queing for a game of league of legends after FINALLY getting off leaverbuster when I get in the game my awful laptop mucks up, it freezes my computer and takes  forever to load, then It stops me from going in the loading screen due to lag. It finally lets me but it took so long It appears I "left the game" when my computer simply lags. I now have to repeat leaverbuster for my computers mistakes, is there a way you guys can remove it from my account? I generally wanted to play and didn't leave on purpose. Please reply, we all make / have bad luck, don't punish us for it, sometimes its not our fault. Riot please pay attention to this and hopefully remove my leaverbuster or understand these issues. Thank you.
